org.princehouse.mica.lib

Class MinAddressLeaderElection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.BaseProtocol
      • org.princehouse.mica.lib.MinAddressLeaderElection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Protocol, LeaderElection

    public class MinAddressLeaderElection
extends BaseProtocol
implements LeaderElection
    Very basic leader election protocol. Addresses have a unique sort order. The "least" address in the system is eventually agreed upon as the leader. Not very robust, but quite simple.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
